indonesia.title: Software House
indonesia.subTitle: Berbasis di Bosnia
indonesia.desc: Balkan Dreams bukan seperti pemain lain dalam game – kami di sini untuk mendominasi lapangan dan menegaskan posisi kami sebagai pemimpin tak terbantahkan dalam pengembangan perangkat lunak di seluruh wilayah Balkan.

bosnia.title: Software House
bosnia.subTitle: Sa sjedištem u Bosni
bosnia.desc: Balkan Dreams nije samo još jedan igrač u igri – mi smo ovdje da dominiramo terenom i potvrdimo svoju poziciju neupitnog lidera u razvoju softvera u cijeloj balkanskoj regiji.

english.title: Software House
english.subTitle: Based in Bosnia
english.desc: Balkan Dreams isn't just another player in the game – we're here to dominate the field and assert our position as the undisputed leader in software development across the entire Balkan region.
